item.title: The Modular Body
item.description:
The Modular Body

The Modular Body is an online science fiction story about the creation of OSCAR, a living organism built from human cells. The protagonist is Cornelis Vlasman, a versatile biologist for whom the path well-travelled is the most uninteresting one by definition.

item.title: BOB FOSSE choreography - " The Rich Man's Frug "
item.description:
BOB FOSSE choreography - " The Rich Man's Frug "

http://www.freds.gr/ The Frug (pronounced "froog") was a dance craze from the 1960s that evolved from another dance of the era, the Chicken. The Chicken, which featured lateral body movements, was used primarily as a change of pace step while doing the Twist.

item.title: Marina Abramovic scene (The Great Beauty/La Grande Bellezza)
item.description:
Marina Abramovic scene (The Great Beauty/La Grande Bellezza)

The concept of Art is central to "The Great Beauty": if Jep takes his stance in society as a performance, the idea of artistic expression as a means of extracting beauty from internal chaos becomes a motif.

item.title: La grande bellezza / The great beauty painting scene
item.description:
La grande bellezza / The great beauty painting scene

That girl was crying. -Nonsense! That girl earns millions! This vibrant sequence, in addition to being a visually dazzling, has a depth, complexity, and tragedy to it that can only be experienced by viewing the film. It's one of many of its kind in the movie.

item.title: Juan Enriquez: The next species of human
item.description:
Juan Enriquez: The next species of human

http://www.ted.com Even as mega-banks topple, Juan Enriquez says the big reboot is yet to come. But don't look for it on your ballot -- or in the stock exchange. It'll come from science labs, and it promises keener bodies and minds. Our kids are going to be ... different.

item.title: Juan Enriquez: Will our kids be a different species?
item.description:
Juan Enriquez: Will our kids be a different species?

http://www.ted.com Throughout human evolution, multiple versions of humans co-existed. Could we be mid-upgrade now? At TEDxSummit, Juan Enriquez sweeps across time and space to bring us to the present moment -- and shows how technology is revealing evidence that suggests rapid evolution may be under way.

item.title: The greatest scene from Ex Machina
item.description:
The greatest scene from Ex Machina

A clip from Ex Machina (2015) This impromptu dance scene is the most brilliant moment in Ex Machina, and now we can't stop rewatching it. We come from the future! io9.com

item.title: American Psycho Intro to Patrick Bateman 720p
item.description:
American Psycho Intro to Patrick Bateman 720p

Before being Batman, Christian Bale was Patrick Bateman in the shocking movie "American Psycho".
